message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in your product, but I'm only able to offer $10000 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $13000. This is still a good deal for both of us, considering the value of the product.  Let me know if this works for you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $13000 is still a bit higher than I'd like to go.  How about we split the difference and I offer $11500?  This would be a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one. I'll offer you the product for $12000. This is my final offer, as I have another buyer ready to purchase it at this price. Let me know what you decide.
Alice, I understand your situation, but $12000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go to $11750.  This is my final offer.  If it doesn't work for you, I'll have to consider my other options.
